verses.verse: And when <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> no children, <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H7065>envied<s%> her <S%H269>sister<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> me <S%H1121>children<s%>, or <S%H369>else<s%> I <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Am I in <S%H430>God's<s%> stead, who hath <S%H4513>withheld<s%> from thee the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%>?

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold my <S%H519>maid<s%> <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, go <S%H935>in<s%> unto her; and she shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> upon my <S%H1290>knees<s%>, that I may also have <S%H1129>children<s%> by her. have: Heb. be built by her
And she <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> unto her.
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1777>judged<s%> me, and hath also <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H1121>son<s%>: therefore <S%H7121>called<s%> she his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1835>Dan<s%>. Dan: that is, Judging
And <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> again, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, With <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H5319>wrestlings<s%> have I <S%H6617>wrestled<s%> with my <S%H269>sister<s%>, and I have <S%H3201>prevailed<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>. great: Heb. wrestlings of God Naphtali: that is, My wrestling: Gr. Nephthalim

When <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H5975>left<s%> <S%H3205>bearing<s%>, she <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> to <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, A <S%H1409>troop<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>. Gad: that is, A troop, or, company
And <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>Leah's<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Happy am <S%H837>I<s%>, for the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will call me <S%H833>blessed<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H836>Asher<s%>. Happy: Heb. In my happiness Asher: that is, Happy

And <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> went <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3812>Leah<s%>. Then <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, Give <S%H5414>me<s%>, I pray thee, of thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Is it a small <S%H4592>matter<s%> that thou hast <S%H3947>taken<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%>? and wouldest thou take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%> also? And <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Therefore he shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with thee to <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>, and <S%H3812>Leah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou must come <S%H935>in<s%> unto me; for <S%H7936>surely<s%> I have <S%H7936>hired<s%> thee with my <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1736>mandrakes<s%>. And he <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her that <S%H3915>night<s%>.
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me my <S%H7939>hire<s%>, <S%H834>because<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> my <S%H8198>maiden<s%> to my <S%H376>husband<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>. Issachar: that is, An hire
And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived<s%> again, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3812>Leah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H2064>endued<s%> me with a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H2065>dowry<s%>; <S%H6471>now<s%> will my <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H2082>dwell<s%> with me, because I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>. Zebulun: that is, Dwelling: Gr. Zabulon
And <S%H310>afterwards<s%> she <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%>. Dinah: that is Judgment
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to her, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H7358>womb<s%>.
And she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath taken <S%H622>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%>:

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>. Joseph: that is, Adding

And it came to pass, when <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> had <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3837>Laban<s%>, Send me <S%H7971>away<s%>, that I may <S%H3212>go<s%> unto mine own <S%H4725>place<s%>, and to my <S%H776>country<s%>.

<S%H5414>Give<s%> me my <S%H802>wives<s%> and my <S%H3206>children<s%>, <S%H2004>for<s%> whom I have <S%H5647>served<s%> thee, and let me <S%H3212>go<s%>: for thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H5656>service<s%> which I have <S%H5647>done<s%> thee.

And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I pray thee, if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favour<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, tarry: for I have learned by <S%H5172>experience<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me for thy <S%H1558>sake<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5344>Appoint<s%> me thy <S%H7939>wages<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H834>how<s%> I have <S%H5647>served<s%> thee, and <S%H834>how<s%> thy <S%H4735>cattle<s%> was with me.

For it was <S%H4592>little<s%> which thou hadst before <S%H6440>I<s%> came, and it is now <S%H6555>increased<s%> unto a <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee since my <S%H7272>coming<s%>: and now <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6213>provide<s%> for mine own <S%H1004>house<s%> also? increased: Heb. broken forth since: Heb. at my foot

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, What shall I give <S%H5414>thee<s%>? And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt not <S%H5414>give<s%> me any <S%H3972>thing<s%>: if thou wilt <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> for me, I will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6629>flock<s%>:

I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through all thy <S%H6629>flock<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5493>removing<s%> from thence all the <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%>, and all the <S%H2345>brown<s%> <S%H7716>cattle<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, and the <S%H2921>spotted<s%> and <S%H5348>speckled<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats<s%>: and of such shall be my <S%H7939>hire<s%>.

So shall my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> for me in <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come<s%>, when it shall <S%H935>come<s%> for my <S%H7939>hire<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>: every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is not <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%> among the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, and <S%H2345>brown<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, that shall be counted <S%H1589>stolen<s%> with me. in time: Heb. to morrow
And <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, I would it might <S%H3863>be<s%> according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.

And he <S%H5493>removed<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> the he <S%H8495>goats<s%> that were <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>, and all the she <S%H5795>goats<s%> that were <S%H5348>speckled<s%> and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>, and every one that had some <S%H3836>white<s%> in it, and all the <S%H2345>brown<s%> among the <S%H3775>sheep<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> betwixt himself and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7462>fed<s%> the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H6629>flocks<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H4731>rods<s%> of <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3839>poplar<s%>, and of the <S%H3869>hazel<s%> and chesnut <S%H6196>tree<s%>; and <S%H6478>pilled<s%> <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H6479>strakes<s%> in them, and made the <S%H3836>white<s%> <S%H4286>appear<s%> which was in the <S%H4731>rods<s%>.

And he <S%H3322>set<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> which he had <S%H6478>pilled<s%> <S%H5227>before<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%> in the <S%H4325>watering<s%> <S%H8268>troughs<s%> when the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>, that they should <S%H3179>conceive<s%> when they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H3179>conceived<s%> before the <S%H4731>rods<s%>, and brought <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%> <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%>, <S%H5348>speckled<s%>, and <S%H2921>spotted<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> did <S%H6504>separate<s%> the <S%H3775>lambs<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6124>ringstraked<s%>, and all the <S%H2345>brown<s%> in the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%>; and he <S%H7896>put<s%> his own <S%H5739>flocks<s%> by themselves, and <S%H7896>put<s%> them not unto <S%H3837>Laban's<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%>.

And it came to pass, whensoever the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%> did <S%H3179>conceive<s%>, that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4731>rods<s%> before the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> in the <S%H7298>gutters<s%>, that they might <S%H3179>conceive<s%> among the <S%H4731>rods<s%>.
But when the <S%H6629>cattle<s%> were <S%H5848>feeble<s%>, he put them not <S%H7760>in<s%>: so the <S%H5848>feebler<s%> were <S%H3837>Laban's<s%>, and the <S%H7194>stronger<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3966><s%>, and had <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H6629>cattle<s%>, and <S%H8198>maidservants<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H1581>camels<s%>, and <S%H2543>asses<s%>.
